page.title: 16HOBBIES AND PURSUITS
page.content: Many people take up sports, join clubs or have collections to fill up spare time. There are many junior football teams in our area. Also there are organisations i.e.scouts, guides for young people. There are also youth and sports clubs. In Little Hadham there is a Disco on a regular basis. In a survey involving 1H & 1WT the most popular collections were *stamps (10) and *Models (8); the most popular sports were *swimming (22) and *horse riding (10); the most popular clubs and organisations were *youth clubs (18) and *youth football (7). The youngsters living in the villages were less able to play with their friends from School than those in the town due to the problems of transport. By Tom Pearson 1H.
